20110112150634.000|20110112150635.000|CC1|GEORGE.                         
20110112150635.000|20110112150635.000|CC1|WE'RE UP ALL NIGHT, CHASING THE 
20110112150635.000|20110112150636.000|CC1|SNOWPLOWS.

20110112150641.000|20110112150641.000|CC1|THE SNOW, RIGHT IN YOUR FACE.   
20110112150641.000|20110112150642.000|CC1|BUT LEGIONS OF CITY WORKERS WERE
20110112150642.000|20110112150646.000|CC1|THERE TO GREET IT.              
20110112150646.000|20110112150650.000|CC1|SOME 365 SALT SPREADERS TO GO
